title: Britain responding to suspected drone strike at Cyprus base
summary_full: The strike hit the RAF Akrotiri base at midnight, the UK's defence ministry said, adding that its forces were handling a "live situation"
summary_public: The strike hit the RAF Akrotiri base at midnight, the UK's defence ministry said, adding that its forces were handling a "live situation"

CY.label: negative
